name: Cardio Pad
description: A medical tablet that allows cardiac tests to be performed in remote areas.
impact: Increases access to heart health diagnostics in rural communities.

name: M-Pesa
description: Mobile money platform transforming how people access financial services.
impact: Enabled millions of unbanked people to transfer and save money securely.

name: Solar Water Pump
description: A solar-powered water pump that helps farmers irrigate their crops.
impact: Increases agricultural productivity and reduces reliance on rain-fed agriculture.

name: MamaOpe Smart Jacket
description: A biomedical smart jacket that diagnoses pneumonia faster and more accurately than a doctor.
impact: Reduces pneumonia misdiagnosis and saves children's lives in rural areas.

name: Silicon Savannah Drones
description: A drone delivery system that transports medical supplies to remote clinics.
impact: Improves access to essential medicines and blood in hard-to-reach areas.

name: Eco-Friendly Briquettes
description: Charcoal briquettes made from recycled agricultural waste, providing a cleaner alternative to wood fuel.
impact: Reduces deforestation and air pollution while creating jobs.

name: mPedigree Goldkeys
description: A mobile-based system that allows consumers to verify the authenticity of medicines using SMS codes.
impact: Helps combat counterfeit drugs and improves public health safety.

name: FarmDrive
description: A digital platform that connects smallholder farmers to financial institutions using data analytics.
impact: Increases access to credit and boosts agricultural productivity.

name: SolarKiosk
description: A modular solar-powered kiosk providing electricity, internet, and essential services to rural communities.
impact: Improves access to clean energy and digital services in off-grid areas.

name: Fonio Processing Machine
description: A machine that automates the cleaning and processing of fonio, a traditional West African grain.
impact: Reduces manual labor and increases production efficiency for local farmers.

name: Paystack
description: A payment processing platform that enables businesses to accept payments online and offline.
impact: Empowers thousands of African businesses with secure and easy payment solutions.
